MoonClerk is an easy-to-use payment form: MoonClerk 是Stripe易用的付款表单生成器。
Your Moonclerk API Key. You can find it: 您的Moonberk API 密钥。您可以在 Moonclerk 帐户设置中找到它。(https://app.moonclerk.com/settings/api-key)
Retrieve a customer plan from MoonClerk: 使用客户ID从 MoonClerk 检索客户计划
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
The ID of the customer to retrieve the p: 客户要检索计划的 ID
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
HEAD: 黑色
Triggers when a payment is created in an: 在任何状态下创建付款时触发(失败，成功等)。
Triggers when a new plan is created in M: 每月办事员创建新计划时触发
Triggers when a plan is canceled or when: 当计划被取消或设定的计数周期被耗尽时触发。
Triggers when a payment related to a pla: 当与计划相关的付款失败时触发。
## MoonClerk Webhook Setup\n:
## MoonClerk Webhook Setup
                To use this trigger, you need to manually set up a webhook in your MoonClerk account:
    
                1. Login to your MoonClerk account.
                2. Navigate to **Account** -> **Settings** -> **Webhooks**.
                3. **Create webhook Endpoint**. keep state as active.
                4. Specify the following URL in the **Webhook URL** field:
                ```text
                {{webhookUrl}}
                ```
                5. Select the **Payment Created** event.
                5. Click Save Agent.

## MoonClerk Webhook Setup
                        To use this trigger, you need to manually set up a webhook in your MoonClerk account:
            
                        1. Login to your MoonClerk account.
                        2. Navigate to **Account** -> **Settings** -> **Webhooks**.
                        3. **Create webhook Endpoint**. keep state as active.
                        4. Specify the following URL in the **Webhook URL** field:
                        ```text
                        {{webhookUrl}}
                        ```
                        5. Select the **Plan Created** event.
                        5. Click Save Agent.

## MoonClerk Webhook Setup
                                    To use this trigger, you need to manually set up a webhook in your MoonClerk account:
                        
                                    1. Login to your MoonClerk account.
                                    2. Navigate to **Account** -> **Settings** -> **Webhooks**.
                                    3. **Create webhook Endpoint**. keep state as active.
                                    4. Specify the following URL in the **Webhook URL** field:
                                    ```text
                                    {{webhookUrl}}
                                    ```
                                    5. Select the **Plan Payment Failed** event.
                                    5. Click Save Agent.
